text:
[redacted_name] masuk ke kamar dan menarik tubuh [redacted_name] menjauh dari [redacted_name]. Ia menatap tajam ke arah [redacted_name]. Sungguh ia tidak mengerti kenapa [redacted_name] sebenci ini dengan [redacted_name], padahal [redacted_name] adalah adik kandungnya sendiri.
"My prin-,"
Plak!
"Jangan berani melukai Tuan Muda!" ucap [redacted_name].
"Gak usah ikut campur dengan urusan kita,"ujar [redacted_name].
[redacted_name] merasakan perih di pipi kanannya. Meskipun begitu, tak ada alasan ia harus marah kepada [redacted_name]. Mata hijaunya yang mengkilap menatap lekat ke arah gadis itu, [redacted_name] hanya bisa menelan ludahnya ketika [redacted_name] mendekati dirinya.
Jemari panjang milik [redacted_name] mengangkat dagu [redacted_name],"Ternyata kau semakin cantik [redacted_name], mana boleh kau menikah dengan pria lemah yang ada terbaring di sana,"ujarnya melirik ke arah [redacted_name].
"Baiklah, karena kau menyuruhku pergi maka akan aku turuti,"[redacted_name] mundur dan melenggang pergi begitu saja.
Uhuk! Uhuk!
[redacted_name] kembali terbatuk, gadis itu segera menanyakan kondisi [redacted_name].
"Apa perlu ke rumah sakit?" tanya [redacted_name].
"Tidak perlu, nanti juga sembuh,"ucap [redacted_name].
"Ta-tapi...,"
"Aku bilang nggak ya nggak! Keluar dari kamar, aku pengen sendiri,"teriak [redacted_name].
Alea menghela nafas,"Kalau butuh apa-apa bilang ya, Tuan muda."
.................
Beberapa hari ini [redacted_number] tidak muncul di hadapannya. [redacted_name] sang kepala pelayan mengatakan bahwa [redacted_name] sedang sibuk dengan pekerjaan jadi tidak ada waktu untuk ke mansion untuk beberapa hari ini. Ya, [redacted_name] cukup senang mendengarnya karena kehadiran [redacted_name] hanya membuatnya risih.
trans:
[redacted_name] entered the room and pulled [redacted_name]'s body away from [redacted_name]. She pierced his gaze towards [redacted_name]. She didn't really understand why [redacted_name] was so hateful towards [redacted_name], while in fact [redacted_name] was his own younger brother.
"My prin-,"
Slap!
"Don't you ever dare to hurt The Young Master!' said [redacted_name].
"Just stay out of our business," said [redacted_name].
[redacted_name] felt the sting on his right cheek. Nevertheless, there was no reason to be mad at [redacted_name]. His shiny green eyes closely gazed into the girl, [redacted_name] could only gulped when [redacted_name] approached her.
[redacted_name]'s long fingers lifted [redacted_name]'s chin, "Turns out you're prettier [redacted_name], you can't be married to a weak guy lying over there," he said glancing towards [redacted_name].
"Alright, I'll leave as you asked me to," [redacted_name] stepped back and walked away just like that.
Coff! Coff!
[redacted_name] coughed again, the girl immediately asked about [redacted_name]'s condition.
"Do we need to go to the hospital?" [redacted_name] asked.
"No need, it'll get better eventually," said [redacted_name]
"Bu-but...,"
"It's no when I said no! Get out of this room, I want to be alone," shouted [redacted_name].
Alea sighed,"Just tell me if you need anything, young Master."
.................
[redacted_name] didn't appear before him for these couple of days. [redacted_name] the butler told him that [redacted_name] was busy with her work so she didn't have any time to go to the mansion for a couple of days. Yes, [redacted_name] was pretty pleased to hear that because [redacted_name]'s presence made him uncomfortable.
